item.title: How do i use stat editor!
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

pk1821:

I’ll show a pic it’s on reenscape[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 05:56:17 PM[/size][hr]Heres the pic but dunno how to use need to see an example by a person…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 05:58:33 PM[/size][hr]cmon…

Do this:

On that same screen, type in level (the number of the stat) (the level you want it to be), then press enter.

For instance, for level 80 attack, you would put level 0 80.

Then, enter save.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i use stat editor!

item.title: How do i use stat editor!
item.dc:creator: @devilsknite0 devilsknite0
item.description:
@devilsknite0 wrote:

… WOW Just Do This.

Start --> My Computer --> Program Files --> MoparScape --> HybridScape --> Characters --> Double Click You Character --> Find The Stats Menu --> Change All To 99 --> Change exp to 14000000

This Is What The Stats Thing Looks Lik If You Need More Help…

[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000 character-skill = 3 95 14000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000

Please Tell Me If You Need More Help
